results.title: Satoshi’s Exercise for the Reader
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Satoshi’s Exercise for the Reader The Bitcoin whitepaper is clear about Bitcoin’s core feature: it is permissionless. Anyone in the world can pay anyone by joining the peer-to-peer network and broadcasting a transaction. Proof of Work consensus even empowers anybody to become a block producer, and means that the only way to reverse a payment is to overpower everyone else […] This post Satoshi’s Exercise for the Reader first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Gl

results.title: Top crypto treasury companies Strategy and Bitmine add to BTC, ETH stacks
results.description: The buys lift Strategy holdings to 717,131 BTC and Bitmine to 4.37 million ETH, expanding corporate crypto treasuries despite continued market weakness.

results.title: Macro headwinds test Bitcoin price as $70K crumbles amid US market volatility
results.description: Bitcoin bulls’ attempt to break above $70,000 stalled after a key US macroeconomic “fear” metric broke a critical threshold. Is a revisit to BTC's yearly lows back in play?

results.title: Tom Lee Expects 'Defining Year for Ethereum' as BitMine Buys ETH Amid 'Rock Bottom' Vibes
results.description: BitMine Immersion Technologies is sitting on a nearly $8 billion unrealized loss, but Tom Lee remains optimistic about Ethereum.

results.title: Nakamoto to acquire BTC Inc, UTXO in $107M all-stock deal
results.description: Nakamoto will acquire BTC Inc and UTXO in an all-stock deal, consolidating Bitcoin media, events and asset management under one Nasdaq-listed company.

results.title: Gemini post-IPO shakeup sees exit of three top executives
results.description: The exchange's chief legal officer, chief operating officer and chief financial officer are out and Cameron Winkelvoss will take on more responsibilities.

results.title: South Korea lifts 9-year corporate crypto ban: What the policy change means
results.description: South Korea reopens crypto to corporations with strict caps and asset limits. This is part of a broader strategy that includes stablecoin legislation and potential spot crypto ETFs.

results.title: Is the Netherlands Taxing Unrealized Crypto Gains? It's Complicated
results.description: From 2028, the Netherlands will update how tax is calculated on unrealized gains. Crypto critics are in uproar—but the reality is nuanced.

results.title: Strategy’s Bitcoin Buying Accelerates as $48 Billion BTC Stash Sits Underwater
results.description: Strategy reported its fourth-largest Bitcoin purchase of the year, a week after Michael Saylor's defense of the company's became a meme.

results.title: Bitcoin price ignores $168M Strategy buy, and falls as Iran tensions escalate
results.description: BTC price fell below the key $70,000 level as tensions between the US and Iran ramped up and a broad risk-asset sell-off liquidated late BTC long positions.

results.title: Abu Dhabi’s Al Warda Raises Bitcoin ETF Stake to 8.2 Million IBIT Shares in Q4 Filing
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Abu Dhabi’s Al Warda Raises Bitcoin ETF Stake to 8.2 Million IBIT Shares in Q4 Filing Abu Dhabi’s Al Warda Investments increased its bitcoin exposure via BlackRock’s IBIT to 8.2 million shares by the end of 2025. This post Abu Dhabi’s Al Warda Raises Bitcoin ETF Stake to 8.2 Million IBIT Shares in Q4 Filing first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: ZeroLend Latest DeFi Platform to Shut Down Amid Liquidity, Revenue Pressures
results.description: ZeroLend cited an inability to "generate sustainable revenue" as it became the latest DeFi platform to wind down amid the ongoing slump.

results.title: 'See You in Court': CFTC Chair Defends Jurisdiction as States Fight Prediction Markets
results.description: CFTC Chairman Michael Selig hit back at states that have been challenging its authority to regulate prediction markets.

results.title: Starknet adds EY Nightfall to enable private payments on Ethereum rails
results.description: StarkWare is integrating EY’s Nightfall privacy protocol into Starknet to give institutions private payments and DeFi access on public Ethereum-aligned rails, while preserving auditability.

results.title: Strategy ($MSTR) Buys $168M in Bitcoin, Expands Holdings to 717,131 BTC

This post Strategy ($MSTR) Buys $168M in Bitcoin, Expands Holdings to 717,131 BTC first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today

results.title: Monad hires former FalconX, BVNK and Optimism executives
results.description: The appointments add traditional finance and institutional crypto experience as the layer-1 blockchain scales its post-launch strategy.

results.title: Binance holds 65% of CEX stablecoin reserves as outflows cool: CryptoQuant
results.description: Stablecoin outflows slow to $2 billion as Binance consolidates 65% of CEX liquidity, signaling capital concentration even amid the ongoing crypto bear market.

results.title: Hardware Wallet Owners Hit With Snail Mail Phishing Campaign
results.description: The paper mailers mimic Ledger and Trezor branding and device update themes to push users toward malicious verification sites.

results.description: The fast-food chain says bitcoin payments have boosted sales, as it channels crypto receipts into a growing corporate reserve.

results.title: Metaplanet Reports $619 Million Loss as Bitcoin Holdings Take Hit
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Metaplanet Reports $619 Million Loss as Bitcoin Holdings Take Hit Tokyo-based bitcoin treasury firm Metaplanet reported a fiscal 2025 net loss of 95 billion yen ($619 million), largely due to a 102.2 billion yen ($666 million) drop in the value of its bitcoin holdings. This post Metaplanet Reports $619 Million Loss as Bitcoin Holdings Take Hit first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Bitcoin Bears Dominate: Failure to Break $71,800 Keeps Downside Risk Alive
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Bitcoin Bears Dominate: Failure to Break $71,800 Keeps Downside Risk Alive Key levels in focus: $65,650 support holds for now, but break below opens $63,000 then Fibonacci $57,800; resistance caps upside at $71,800–$74,500. This post Bitcoin Bears Dominate: Failure to Break $71,800 Keeps Downside Risk Alive first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Ethan Greene - Feral Analysis and Juan Galt.
